column5: Big Chief- Crack-a- Unit and the Bear.
:DGreat video there Chris  Now the ice is done!!!   Time for thoughts of Soft Water,  Long Rods, and Float Planes

Who's feeling some of that summer fishing coming along...?  Who's thinking of days ahead with a little reflecting on good days gone by?  Mr. Chris Brock is!  Some good memories in that little diddy for ya.
Thanks for putting that together Chris really enjoyed all the photos of fish, flora and pictographs great job. By the way was that the Cam Lake Outpost Camp.  Cheers Mitch

Man that was great to see. Especially when I realized it was a montage of photos not a video and stopped swearing at my laptop. I fish 99% here on Erie, water 360 degrees then more water. Not like up North, nothing to see, big fish but it can get boring really fast fishing longline unless you are dodging a lake freighter. We had a camp south of Westmeath on the Ottawa and I really miss the scenery like in your video as well as the former in laws place on Nippising. I have to do more shore fishing for Bass this year.  Thanks for the memories Sir, appreciated.
That was a Tea Party instrumental, right?  Great compilation.
My sister in law put that together years ago.  Yes, that little shack is Cam Lake.  Yep, Tea Party Chad.
I wanna go with next time!
I need to get back up there somewhere to rejuvenate the soul ...
A shack is being kind, lol.
Holy day dreamin' on a crappy afternoon. Thanks for that Chris!
